argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fsum2mul.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 2 |  | fsum2mul.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. Fin ) |
| 3 |  | fsum2mul.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ j e. A ) -> C e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | fsum2mul.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. B ) -> D e. CC ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_fsumcl | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. B D e. CC ) |
| 6 | 1, 5, 3 | #P_fsummulc1 | |- ( ph -> ( sum_ j e. A C x. sum_ k e. B D ) = sum_ j e. A ( C x. sum_ k e. B D ) ) |
| 7 | 2 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ j e. A ) -> B e. Fin ) |
| 8 | 4 | #P_adantlr | |- ( ( ( ph /\ j e. A ) /\ k e. B ) -> D e. CC ) |
| 9 | 7, 3, 8 | #P_fsummulc2 | |- ( ( ph /\ j e. A ) -> ( C x. sum_ k e. B D ) = sum_ k e. B ( C x. D ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_sumeq2dv | |- ( ph -> sum_ j e. A ( C x. sum_ k e. B D ) = sum_ j e. A sum_ k e. B ( C x. D ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_eqtr2d | |- ( ph -> sum_ j e. A sum_ k e. B ( C x. D ) = ( sum_ j e. A C x. sum_ k e. B D ) ) |
